      private int addAllNumbers()

      This method returns an array of integers which stores the occurence of each face.

      This method returns true if "countOfFaces" contains the number "num" otherwise returns false.
      private boolean diceContains(int num)
      This method returns true if "dice" contains the integer "num" i.e., the value of "num" has occurred atleast once after rolling the dice otherwise returns false.

      This method returns true if "dice" contains all the numbers in the string "nums" i.e., all the numbers in the "sequence" has occurred atleast once after rolling the dice otherwise returns false.

      This method returns true if the selected category matches the dice configuration otherwise returns false.

      This method returns the names of the winners.

      This method gives the bonus to the players who got more than the required upper score and adds the bonus to their total scores.

      This method returns true if the dice configuration is four of a kind otherwise returns false.

      This method returns true if the dice configuration is full house otherwise returns false.

      • run

        public void run()
        The game starts here. It asks about number of players and their names. creates setup for the game and calls "playGame" method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class acm.program.GraphicsProgram

      • playGame

        private void playGame()
        This method plays a complete game.

      • firstRoll

        private void firstRoll(int player)
        This method rolls the dice for the first time.
        Parameters:
        player - An integer representing the player.

      • nextTwoRolls

        private void nextTwoRolls(int player)
        This method gives the two chances after the first roll. During each chance it asks to select the dice, the player wants to reroll and rolls them after clicking on the "Roll Dice" button.
        Parameters:
        player - An integer representing the player.

      • selectCategory

      • diceMatchesCategory

        private boolean diceMatchesCategory(int category)
        This method returns true if the selected category matches the dice configuration otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        category - A static constant integer representing the selected category.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • countOccurences

        private int[] countOccurences()
        This method returns an array of integers which stores the occurence of each face. for example: if the dice has values - 2, 4, 4, 5, 3 then the returned array will have values - 0, 1, 1, 2, 1, 0 It means that 1 occurs 0 time, 2 occurs 1 time, 3 occurs 1 time, 4 occurs 2 times, 5 occurs 1 time and 6 occurs 0 time.
        Returns:
        int[]

      • isThreeOfAKind

        private boolean isThreeOfAKind()
        This method returns true if the dice configuration is three of a kind otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        boolean

        private boolean isFourOfAKind()
        This method returns true if the dice configuration is four of a kind otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isFullHouse

        private boolean isFullHouse()
        This method returns true if the dice configuration is full house otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • countOfFacesContains

        private boolean countOfFacesContains(int num)
        This method returns true if "countOfFaces" contains the number "num" otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        num - An int, number between 1 and 6(both including).
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isSmallStraight

        private boolean isSmallStraight()
        This method returns true if dice configuration is is small straight otherwise returns false.
        Returns:

      • diceContains

        private boolean diceContains(int num)
        This method returns true if "dice" contains the integer "num" i.e., the value of "num" has occurred atleast once after rolling the dice otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        num - An int, number between 1 and 6(both including).
        Returns:
        boolean

      • diceContains

        private boolean diceContains(java.lang.String nums)
        This method returns true if "dice" contains all the numbers in the string "nums" i.e., all the numbers in the "sequence" has occurred atleast once after rolling the dice otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        nums - A string of numeric letters representing the numbers on the dice.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isLargeStraight

        private boolean isLargeStraight()
        This method returns true if dice configuration is a large straight otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        boolean

        private boolean isYahtzee()
        This method returns true if dice configuration is yahtzee otherwise returns false.
        Returns:

      • getScore

        private int getScore(int category)
        This method returns the score of the selected category.
        Parameters:
        category - An integer representing the selected category.
        Returns:
        int The score of the selected category.

      • getScoreForUpperCategories

        private int getScoreForUpperCategories(int category)
        This method returns the score for upper categories. If the selected categroy is "TWOS" then the score is sum of all the twos in the dice.
        Parameters:
        category - An integer representing the selected category.
        Returns:
        int The sum of all the category numbers.

      • addAllNumbers

        private int addAllNumbers()
        This method returns the score by adding all the numbers on the dice.
        Returns:
        int The sum of all the numbers those have come up on the dice.

      • setScores

        private void setScores(int player,
                       int category,
                       int score)
        This method sets the scores in the "scorecard" array updates the scores in the scorecard on the UI.
        Parameters:
        category - A static constant representing a category.
        player - An int representing the player.
        score - An int, the score to be filled.

      • giveBonus

        private void giveBonus()
        This method gives the bonus to the players who got more than the required upper score and adds the bonus to their total scores.

      • getWinner

        private java.lang.String getWinner()
        This method returns the names of the winners.
        Returns:
        String Name of the winner of the game.
